8-legs-to-love.title: 8 Legs to Love
8-legs-to-love.description: Spin a web, eat bugs, earn points, and have fun!

snowboarding.title: Snowboarding
snowboarding.description: Downhill snowboarding simulation. Left/Right to turn, Z to jump.

racquet-panic.title: Racquet Panic
racquet-panic.description: Breakout but with a tennis player. Left/Right to move, Z to forehand, Up + Z to spike, Down + Z to lob.

minepick-platformer.title: Minepick Platformer
minepick-platformer.description: Test for a platformer where you can lodge a minepike into walls. Left/Right to move, X to jump, Z to swing.
